topic.title: How to Generate Accessible Image Maps

bodydiv.p: For image maps, text alternatives are needed on both the image element itself (to describe the informative context) and on each of the area elements (to convey the link destination or the action that will be initiated if the link is followed). The xref content within the area element contains the intended alternative text or hover text for that image map area.
